ConfigComment: This is the extra auto concede settings file.

values.comment: Concede when number of cards in hand is less than 3 and the health difference is 20 or more.
values.condition: my_hand(count()) < 3 AND (opp_hero(count(), health) + opp_hero(count(), armor) - my_hero(count(), health) - my_hero(count(), armor)) > 20

values.comment: Concede when deck has less than 2 cards left and you're not winning by at least 10 HP.
values.condition: my_deck(count()) < 2 AND (my_hero(count(), health) + my_hero(count(), armor) - opp_hero(count(), health) - opp_hero(count(), armor)) < 10

values.comment: Concede when you have 10 mana, your opponent has more than 2 more cards than you and more than 2 more minions than you.
values.condition: my_hero(count(), max_mana) > 9 AND opp_hand(count()) > (my_hand(count()) + 2) AND my_minions(count()) < (opp_minions(count()) - 2)
